objective_summary.value: Generate c.$10–12k per year private retirement income with 50% survivor benefit for Jennifer, alongside Social Security, using annuity and/or systematic withdrawals, while managing volatility close to retirement.
objective_summary.citation: CLIENT1: [00:03:50] ... out of these three things I could achieve, say, 10 to 12 thousands a year income. Yeah with a 50% payment to Jennifer if I died.

objective_summary.value: Target combined retirement income of about $36k per year: $12k Social Security + $12k private income for Jerome, and $12k Social Security for Jennifer.
